attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls for the proper licensing of Hunting Crossbows & Black Widow Catapults etc. These weapons are as leathal as any gun & freely available to anyone,
They are also being regularly used by thugs to target animals for fun .
see:
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/debate/article-2689463/Why-ban-monstrous-crossbows-Yobs-Britain-using-kill-maim-animals-fun.html
